entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day

text: @realDonaldTrump "Bustling", and Covid-19 pandemic presents an irony which is difficult to ignore. It will be interesting to see how this little experiment works out and whether your voters survive until election day. I think the Dems might be smart to "stay home" to boost vote count later..
